properties.name: sql_version
properties.description: Determines the version of the T-SQL language to use.

properties.name: sql_engine_type
properties.description: Determines the SQL engine to use.

properties.name: align_clause_bodies
properties.description: Align the bodies of clauses.

properties.name: align_column_definition_fields
properties.description: Align the fields of column definitions.

properties.name: align_set_clause_item
properties.description: Align the items in set clauses.

properties.name: allow_external_language_paths
properties.description: Allow paths to external languages.

properties.name: allow_external_library_paths
properties.description: Allow paths to external libraries.

properties.name: as_keyword_on_own_line
properties.description: Place the AS keyword on its own line.

properties.name: include_semicolons
properties.description: Include semicolons at the end of statements.

properties.name: indent_set_clause
properties.description: Indent the set clause.

properties.name: keyword_casing
properties.description: Set the casing for keywords.

properties.name: indentation_size
properties.description: Set the size of indentation.

properties.name: indent_view_body
properties.description: Indent the body of views.

properties.name: multiline_insert_sources_list
properties.description: Format the sources list in insert statements as multiline.

properties.name: multiline_insert_targets_list
properties.description: Format the targets list in insert statements as multiline.

properties.name: multiline_select_elements_list
properties.description: Format the select elements list as multiline.

properties.name: multiline_set_clause_items
properties.description: Format the set clause items as multiline.

properties.name: multiline_view_columns_list
properties.description: Format the view columns list as multiline.

properties.name: multiline_where_predicates_list
properties.description: Format the where predicates list as multiline.

properties.name: new_line_before_close_parenthesis_in_multiline_list
properties.description: Insert a new line before the closing parenthesis in multiline lists.

properties.name: new_line_before_from_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the from clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_group_by_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the group by clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_having_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the having clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_join_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the join clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_offset_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the offset clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_open_parenthesis_in_multiline_list
properties.description: Insert a new line before the opening parenthesis in multiline lists.

properties.name: new_line_before_order_by_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the order by clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_output_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the output clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_where_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the where clause.

properties.name: new_line_before_window_clause
properties.description: Insert a new line before the window clause.

properties.name: newline_formatted_check_constraint
properties.description: Format check constraints with new lines.

properties.name: newline_formatted_index_definition
properties.description: Format index definitions with new lines.

properties.name: num_newlines_after_statement
properties.description: Set the number of new lines after a statement.

properties.name: space_between_data_type_and_parameters
properties.description: Insert a space between data type and parameters.

properties.name: space_between_parameters_in_data_type
properties.description: Insert a space between parameters in data type.
